plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fantasy, their favourite kind of plot is character-driven, their favourite setting is a fictional world, their favourite writing style is descriptive, their favourite length is novel-length, their favourite topic is magic, their favourite pacing is slow-burn, their favourite narrative structure is third-person omniscient, and their favourite themes are love and self-discovery. Additionally, it can be inferred that the user enjoys books with strong female characters and complex relationships.
